title: Gluteofemoral erythema of pregnancy: a pregnancy-specific skin disease
details: Y Zhang, W Wang, C Zhang, W Li - Clinical and Experimental Dermatology, 2025
abstract: We report a case of gluteofemoral erythema of pregnancy that occurred in both the first and second pregnancies of one patient. This disease is closely related to pregnancy and is a pregnancy-specific skin disease. Similar cases and their features …
